chunk:
Jan Marini Skin Research Bioglycolic® Face Cleanser

Brand: Jan Marini Skin Research

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycolic Acid, Sorbitol, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Sodium Hydroxide, Ammonium Lauryl Sulfate, Palmitic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol
book: 2682-Jan Marini Skin Research Bioglycolic® Face Cleanser

chunk:
Directions: Gently massage a quarter-sized amount of this non-irritating cleanser over dry skin. Remove with a clean, wet, and wrung-out washcloth. Splash your face 10-15 times with lukewarm water. Blot dry.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 2682-Jan Marini Skin Research Bioglycolic® Face Cleanser
